climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 𝑷𝒓𝒆𝒎𝒊𝒖𝒎 𝑷𝑼 𝑳𝒆𝒂𝒕𝒉𝒆𝒓: The Marsail office desk chair elevates comfort to a new level with premium PU leather upholstery. Not only is the PU leather soft and durable, but it also wraps the seat cushion that is 25% thicker than typical office chairs, ensuring unparalleled quality and comfort

𝑬𝒏𝒋𝒐𝒚 𝑬𝒓𝒈𝒐𝒏𝒐𝒎𝒊𝒄 𝑪𝒐𝒎𝒇𝒐𝒓𝒕: This executive office chair is designed to contour the natural shape of your body to provide exceptional support for your neck, back, and lumbar, allowing you to maintain comfort throughout the day without the discomfort associated with prolonged sitting

𝑹𝒆𝒄𝒍𝒊𝒏𝒆 𝒕𝒐 𝑹𝒆𝒍𝒂𝒙: The computer chair can smoothly recline 90°–120°, offering both upright and relaxed chair positions. Enjoy a rocking lounge chair right at your desk for moments when you need to take a break from all the hard work

𝑭𝒍𝒊𝒑-𝑼𝒑 𝑨𝒓𝒎𝒓𝒆𝒔𝒕𝒔: The leather office chair features armrests that can flip up 90° to save space when not in use. Whether you need to push your chair under the desk, or simply prefer more unrestricted movement while working, the armrests can be positioned to suit your preference

𝑩𝒖𝒊𝒍𝒕 𝒕𝒐 𝑳𝒂𝒔𝒕: Engineered with a 27.6″ oversized base and an SGS-certified gas lift, this office desk chair provides maximum stability for up to 300 lbs of weight. The center of the backrest is breathable to help keep you cool and dry with better airflow to your body.

𝑬𝒂𝒔𝒚 𝑻𝒐 𝑨𝒔𝒔𝒆𝒎𝒃𝒍𝒆: We offer installation instructions and videos to help you easily and quickly assemble the office chair yourself. It usually takes about 10-20 minutes to assemble. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us

𝟓-𝒀𝒆𝒂𝒓 𝑪𝒖𝒔𝒕𝒐𝒎𝒆𝒓 𝑨𝒔𝒔𝒖𝒓𝒂𝒏𝒄𝒆: We provide 5 years of after-sales guarantee! If there are problems such as missing parts, product damage, or other unsatisfactory issues, please contact us via the email address provided in the instruction manual- our dedicated team responds within 24 hours during workdays. Thank you for choosing Marsail office chair. We will be responsible for your choice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price
reviews.reviewText: This chair was fairly easy to assemble, came packaged well so that all pieces didn't mess up each other in shipping. There is only one thing wrong and that is I think that the wheels should have been bigger or bulkier for the size of the chair, because it can tip over if you are leaning back or rocking with it, if you don't have the wheels a certain way.The chair is very comfortable, I love being able to have armrest or no armrest when needed, love the option to rock or not. The height is adjustable, it is easy to wipe down and hair does not stick to it. Soft and not stiff UP Leather. Definitely happy that I bought it for my new craft/business desk. Looks great with the wood and black steel desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars She loves it!
reviews.reviewText: The "how to build video" really did the trick. I actually didn't open the instructions at all as I watched the video once and I was able to put the chair together real fast.She loves how comfortable it is and how she can set the chair to rock. Nice pick up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the chair. Had to deduct a point for putting it together. The instructions were wonderful, but the screws to the arms were extremely difficult to line up & screw in. One we never could get it in all the way. Love that the arms will raise up & that you can lean it back a little or lock it so it won’t lean back. All with the same lever that you raise & lower it. Thanks for the good instructions. Best instructions I’ve seen in orders in a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The chair is packaged with such care protection that It had me saying wow! I was also amazed at how easy it was to assemble without looking at the manual. I was also impressed with the quality of the workman ship as well as the beauty of the chair Itself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Masculine, Comfortable & Easy Assembly!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My husband has been looking for a new office chair and we kept going back over comfort and design. This was the perfect chair for both of us! The chair is super comfortable for him to sit on 40-60 hours a week and the leather looks great in the office. It was pretty easy to put together and I would highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars MSRP should be $20-$30 cheaper
reviews.reviewText: I have some gripes, but it's also a step down from the big comfy high back chair that I'm used to. It went together with ease and everything was masked when I received it, so it's finishes were perfectly preserved. Not a single scratch....I was happily surprised. It feels solid and durable and provides some good lumbar support. I like the wheels and they are able to let me move around with ease, even on a thicker carpet. The tuck-away armrests are a nice touch that I'm getting used to.The chair itself feels like it would fit a shorter person much more comfortably because the back only comes up even with my shoulders (I'm 5' 9"). Trying to recline and rest my head (had neck surgery recently) is nothing shy of a complicated feat. I wish this thing had a headrest and had I paid attention to the backrest meaurements, I would've never looked at it twice.I've been through quite a few office chairs in my lifetime and quite a few have proven their worth in cost vs comfort, so I have a pretty good sense of what works for me. When I typed in "Highback Office Chair", this showed up and I see that it wasn't catagorized properly. A highback is any chair that provides neck/head support...this ain't it and the shape of the back wasn't contoured for it. I'm probably going to give this one to my son and find one that fits the bill for me. As for the $150+ price tag (I paid $109 after coupon)... it's more like an $80 chair with some manufacturer gouging for good measure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift for Christmas. I needed a big mans chair and this fit the bill. It was easy to put together, was comfortable and easy to operate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the chair, pretty comfortable (have not sit on it all day while working yet), great instructions for assembly, BUT, 2 of the holes you screw the arm rests in on both sides are on a angle which makes it difficult to screw the screws in. Took 2 others plus myself to get the screws all the way in. A annoying defect as other than that a piece of cake to assemble.
